raw: * Module for mediaqueries evaluation. The module is a wrapper for media.match.js,
* that implements a polyfill for window.matchMedia when it's not supported natively.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Module for mediaqueries evaluation. The module is a wrapper for media.match.js, that implements a polyfill for window.matchMedia when it's not supported natively.

raw: * Evaluates the specified mediaquery list
* @param query {String} the media query to evaluate
* @return {qx.bom.MediaQuery}  The media query
* @attachStatic {qxWeb, matchMedia}

@param.name: @param
@param.body: query {String} the media query to evaluate

raw: * Adds screen size classes (e.g. small-only or medium-up) by pre-defined media queries using em.
* The range goes from small to medium, large and xlarge up to xxlarge:
* small: 0em - 40em
* medium: 40.063em - 64em
* large: 64.063em - 90em
* xlarge: 90.063em - 120em
* xxlarge: > 120.063em
* The suffix of the class name indicates either that the current screen
* is larger than this size (*-up) or in that range (*-only).
* @attachStatic {qxWeb}

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds screen size classes (e.g. small-only or medium-up) by pre-defined media queries using em. The range goes from small to medium, large and xlarge up to xxlarge: small: 0em - 40em medium: 40.063em - 64em large: 64.063em - 90em xlarge: 90.063em - 120em xxlarge: > 120.063em The suffix of the class name indicates either that the current screen is larger than this size (-up) or in that range (-only).

raw: * Adds or removes a class depending on matching a given media query
* @param query {String} the media query to evaluate
* @param className {String} css class name that gets bind to an element

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds or removes a class depending on matching a given media query

@param.name: @param
@param.body: query {String} the media query to evaluate

@param.name: @param
@param.body: className {String} css class name that gets bind to an element
@param.description: css class name that gets bind to an element

raw: * Listens for media query updates and applies/removes the css class.
* @param queryString {String} the media query to evaluate
* @param className {String} css class name that gets bind to an element
* @attach {qxWeb}
* @return {qxWeb} Self instance for chaining

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Listens for media query updates and applies/removes the css class.

@param.body: queryString {String} the media query to evaluate

@param.name: @param
@param.body: className {String} css class name that gets bind to an element
